name: Saving Christmas (Ryan Laley Games)
description:
Set off as Santa to save Christmas from the Goblins and the chilling Jack Frost! Explore and collect all the presents and save the Holidays!

This game was made in roughly 100 hours including filming how to create it. You can follow the series on YouTube.com/c/ryanlaley and make this game yourself with all the assets included for you to use.

Happy Holidays from Ryan Laley Games!
